aka: A Long Journey, A Long Tunnel
trans_title: A Long Journey, A Long Tunnel
introduction: Hwang Hyeonwon, a broadcasting reporter, continues to request interviews with Dr. Jang Woo - woo, who returned to the United States after receiving his Ph.D. in engineering from the United States. He resigns to marry Han - As a result of a traffic accident and a hospital accident, Han, who was contacted, went to the hospital and found that Hye - won was a dead person with liver cancer rather than a traffic accident. Han decided to take care of her short life Two of them will start their tearful life together. Han can arrange a reunion with her mother, who will be her last hope, and let her leave the world with a clean heart.
